item.description:
This week I thought we would try something different. Instead of giving feedback, the goal of this meetup is to do some actual writing. I will come equipped with some writing exercises, but everyone should feel free to write whatever flows freely from their fingertips.

More details to follow, and location may be subject to change. I have a few ideas.

Alexa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there trying to save seats and reading
item.name: The Writing 20-30 Something Creative Writers of Boston February Meetup
